summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5761 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 2, E. H. Jackson's Addition, being the alley between 18 Avenue South and 19th Avenue South, from Hinds Street to Horton Street; and certain other alleys, by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 75967, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
